com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.shared_services

Interface IDataServiceProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IColumnarService, IDataWarehouseService, IDocumentService, IGeospatialService, IGraphService, ISearchIndexService, IStorageService, ITemporalService

    public interface IDataServiceProvider
    Provides an optional generic data service interface
    Author:
    Alex

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IDataServiceProvider.IGenericDataService
      A collection of method calls that represents a generic data service in Aleph2 Not all of the methods make sense for all data services - the optional is used to indicate whether a particular method can be invoked (for a particular bucket)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Optional<IDataServiceProvider.IGenericDataService> getDataService()
      If this service instance has a data service associated with it, then return an interface that enables its use
      default CompletableFuture<Collection<BasicMessageBean>> onPublishOrUpdate(DataBucketBean bucket, Optional<DataBucketBean> old_bucket, boolean suspended, Set<String> data_services, Set<String> previous_data_services)
      Callback to all registered data services whenever a bucket is modified
      default IDataServiceProvider secured(IServiceContext service_context, AuthorizationBean auth_bean)
      Returns a secured version of the data provider service.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataService

        default Optional<IDataServiceProvider.IGenericDataService> getDataService()
        If this service instance has a data service associated with it, then return an interface that enables its use
        Returns:
        the generic data service interface

      • onPublishOrUpdate

        default CompletableFuture<Collection<BasicMessageBean>> onPublishOrUpdate(DataBucketBean bucket,
                                                                          Optional<DataBucketBean> old_bucket,
                                                                          boolean suspended,
                                                                          Set<String> data_services,
                                                                          Set<String> previous_data_services)
        Callback to all registered data services whenever a bucket is modified
        Parameters:
        bucket - - the bucket in question
        old_bucket - - if the bucket has been updated, then this is the old version
        suspended - - if the bucket is currently suspended
        data_services - - the set of data services the implementing class instance handles (eg ES can handle data_warehouse, search_index_service, etc)
        previous_data_services - - the set of data services the previous bucket's implementing class instance handles (eg ES can handle data_warehouse, search_index_service, etc)
        Returns:
        a future containing an optional return message

      • secured

        default IDataServiceProvider secured(IServiceContext service_context,
                                     AuthorizationBean auth_bean)
        Returns a secured version of the data provider service.
        Parameters:
        service_context - - the system service context
        auth_bean - - the authorization context of the calling user
        Returns:
        the secured version of the CRUD service
